caption: Food is decent but they’re always out of a lot of meals. Service is generally pretty terrible. We’ve had to awkwardly go back and forth with the employees about orders they’ve gotten wrong. Every time we come into the store and ask for help to pick up an order we have been completely ignored for 10 to 15 minutes without any acknowledgment. The food is just not worth the hassle of dealing with the employees.

Got the cumin beef crispy meat bun and it was delicious!! Absolutely the right price for the food. My partner got a poké bowl and was also really happy with the generous servings of protein and toppings. Service is friendly and prompt. Highly recommend for a quick, tasty, wallet-friendly meal or snack.

I celebrated my birthday yesterday in this excellent restaurant. I am glad to say that it was a awesome evening and the venue was clearly the reason for that outstanding event. The stuff  helped in a gorgeous style, the food was extremely good and my buddies were extremely  cheerful. We shall no dout visit again for more events. Thank you very much.
I never leave a review, but please stay away from this place. Horrible food quality, but expensive. There are other better restaurants near by.
(Translated by Google) The pork bun with bacon sauce is very authentic and highly recommended!  (Original) 腊汁肉夹馍很正宗，强烈推荐！
Love the ramen and boba tea here! Is my favorite place for boba tea
Great food!!! Highly recommended. Very easy to order and pickup. Love the Ramen.
Food is good however they don’t always make orders correctly. Be sure to double check the Ingredients in your order before leaving. I have had this happen a few times.

Very nice place to get delicious “meat bun” from my hometown. It’s not authentic in the sense that the bun is more crispy. But I actually favored their buns. Very very nice. And if you want Xian food, this is better than the other one for Roujiamo.

I celebrated my PhD yesterday in this excellent restaurant. I am glad to say that we enjoyed a fine evening and the restaurant was definitely the reason for this outstanding evening. The stuff  cooperated in a splendid manner, the cuisine was tasty and my friends were very  glad. We shall surely return for more events. Thank you very much.
Best Chicken Wings in the DC, Maryland, Virginia Area. Scary Good.
Most of my takoyaki were missing octopus and I felt rushed while ordering even though I was the only one in the restaurant. Portions dished into the poke bowl were very small.
I ordered sushi king on door dash and after 40 mins of waiting they canceled my order... stay away from this bad business place

The sashimi was ok. The rice in the sushi was warm which was not supposed to, but im guessing is because the restaurant is new and the crew is new too. And they also barely speak english and could not understand our orders. The all you can eat menu has almost no hot plates, which is something I consider a lot. Comparing to the sushi king in Sterling I will give it a 4 and Sterling 10+. And is more expensive than Sterling too so keep that in mind. I was so happy when I found out they opened one in Rockville but then very disappointed with the menu. Ive been to 5 Sushi Kings already around the us and this is the worst by far. My advice is to add some hot plates and deep fried sushi to the all you can eat menu. I would love to go back for that!

The sushi is good but there are not many items on the menu to order compare to the sushi king in Sterling , VA or VA beach. They both restaurants have more than 100 items to order but sushi king in Rockville just have 30 items on the memu.  Also no dessert, and fruit . Their price is also cheaper too. I think I dont think I will go back there again.
I go there all the time! The sushi is delicious cheap and fast, I usually pop in and they ask me if I want what I usually get witch is the California roll and they make it and I pay
